value: Offenses Known to Law Enforcement at state and city level for the year 2020

To download the file:
Go to the url -> "Crime in the United States Annual Reports" Section -> Select Year -> Select "Offenses Known to Law Enforcement" -> Click "Download".
A zip file will get downloaded. Unzip it and select table number 8 to get the same dataset.
Added "combined_crime" column in data set. This column is sum of "Violent Crime Total" and "Property Crime Total" which give combine crime sv.(Count_CriminalActivities_CombinedCrime)
